tool_description: An API that provides movies info that includes download and streaming links.
name: Movieera-101
title: Movieera-101

api_list.name: Image
api_list.description: Get a poster or backdrop image of a specific Movie.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movieera-101.p.rapidapi.com/image/original/nkayOAUBUu4mMvyNf9iHSUiPjF1.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movieera-101.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movieera-101.p.rapidapi.com/image/{type}/{imagepath}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movieera-101.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: **Search movies using the title, id (from /movies or /trending endpoint), and IMDB id.**

api_list.name: Movie
api_list.description: **Get all the details and download links about a specific movie.**
